title: China Refined Jiuzhai Stay within UNESCO World Heritage-Listed Jiuzhaigou Valley National Park
description: Escape the urban sprawl without surrendering modern comforts at Hotel Indigo Jiuzhai, an IHG Hotel, your personal gateway to China's great outdoors. Embark on an expedition to connect with nature as you visit the beautiful UNCESO World Heritage-listed Jiuzhaigou National Park. Be captivated by year-round beauty in this photographer's paradise as you take in rugged mountainous vistas, shimmering lakes and abundant wildlife before well-earned drinks at onsite Glamour Bar.
location_description: Hotel Indigo Jiuzhai, an IHG Hotel
offer_address: Jiuzhai County, Zhangzha, Town, Ngawa Tibetan and Qiang Autonomous Prefecture, China, 623402
